Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: TotalLosses
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @AI* (xsd:decimal)

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: Hospitals_destroyed
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @AK* (xsd:decimal)

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: Injured
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @Z*(xsd:decimal)

Individual: @R*
Types: Organisation
Facts: performsRoleIn database_reporting

Collections.comment: Instances of Event types... Event pattern connect instances to report stub,  place and time, together with corresponding comments
Collections.rule:
Individual: @C*
Types: @B*
Facts: occursAtPlace @J*,
             occursAtTime @K*(xsd:dateTime),
             hasReport @S*
Annotations: rdfs:comment @N*

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: Schools_destroyed
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @AJ* (xsd:decimal)

Individual: @Q*
Types: Organisation
Facts: performsRoleIn Source

Collections.comment: connect  agent role pattern and reporting stub
Collections.rule:
Individual: @S*
Types: HazardReport
Facts: providesAgentRole  Source, 
          providesAgentRole database_reporting,

            containsImpactIndicator Missing,
           containsImpactIndicator Death,
            containsImpactIndicator Crops_affected,
            originatesFrom @AM*(IRI)

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: Death
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @Y* (xsd:decimal)

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report
Collections.rule:
Individual: Missing
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @AA* (xsd:decimal)

Collections.comment: Impact indicators in the hazard report in hectares
Collections.rule:
Individual: Crops_affected
Types: ImpactIndicator
Facts: hasValue @AL* (xsd:decimal)
